patthana8.13:1.1_0: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.13:1.1_1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.13:1.1_2: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo ca nanakenaci viññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.13:2.1_0: Nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.13:3.1_0: Nakenaci viññeyyañca nanakenaci viññeyyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
